What are the symptoms of Paget's Disease of Bone ?,"Pain may be a symptom, especially among people with more advanced Paget's disease. Affected bones also can become enlarged, misshapen, and more fragile and likely to break. Misshapen bones tend to be most noticeable in the legs, skull, and spine.",NIHSeniorHealth,Paget's Disease of Bone
